tagline: Architects type systems that make impossible states unrepresentable — types are design, not decoration
pros: Advanced type system design — conditional types, generics, discriminated unions
Makes codebases self-documenting through precise type signatures
JS-to-TS migration strategies that don't stall development
Compiler performance awareness for large codebase type checking
cons: Type perfectionism can slow down rapid iteration
Complex types can intimidate less experienced team members
Less effective on projects where TypeScript isn't the primary language
